# Alice's message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe is worth a significant amount to the right buyer.  While I can't divulge specifics at this time, I can tell you that I've already received another offer for $1500000.  I'm confident that this product holds even greater value for you.  I'm willing to offer it to you for $1750000. This is a one-time opportunity, and I believe it will be a valuable investment for you. Please let me know your decision. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,750,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,750,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
